value.title: Architect modern applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to build modern applications using PaaS services for applications, caching, containers and Kubernetes in Azure.

topItems.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
topItems.excerpt: Package a web app so that it can be deployed as a Docker image and run from an Azure Container Instance.

images.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker

topItems.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to run containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI).

images.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances

topItems.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
topItems.excerpt: Azure Container Registry is a managed Docker registry service based on the open-source Docker Registry 2.0. Container Registry is private, hosted in Azure, and allows you to build, store, and manage images for all types of container deployments. Learn how to build and store container images with Azure Container Registry.

images.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Azure App Service enables you to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. Learn how to create a website through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

images.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
Build a containerized web application with Docker

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Azure DevOps enables transparency and cooperation with continuous delivery and deployment for your development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore what DevOps is (and isn't) and learn how to get started with Azure DevOps.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn to foster the DevOps values of transparency and team cooperation with Azure Boards.

images.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to your end users. Azure DevOps is a set of services that gives you the tools you need to do just that. With Azure DevOps, you can build, test, and deploy any application, either to the cloud or on premises. DevOps practices that enable transparency, cooperation, continuous delivery and continuous deployment become embedded in your software development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore what DevOps is (and isn't) and learn how to get started with Azure DevOps.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn to foster the DevOps values of transparency and team cooperation with Azure Boards.

images.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to customize NoSQL data storage and distribution with the Azure portal, Cosmos DB extension, and Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

topItems.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
topItems.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: NoSQL data is an efficient way to store information that doesn’t map to the requirements of a relational SQL database. Learn how to use the Azure portal, the Azure Cosmos DB extension for Visual Studio Code, and the Azure Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK to work with your NoSQL data where you want, and provide your users with high availability, no matter where they are in the world.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate security into your architecture design, and discover the tools that Azure provides to help you create a secure environment through all the layers of your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) strategy
value.excerpt:
Learn how Site Reliability Engineering enables you to sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
topItems.excerpt: Organizations big and small have started to realize just how crucial system and application reliability is to their business. They’ve also learned just how difficult it is to maintain that reliability while iterating at the speed demanded by the marketplace. Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a proven approach to this challenge.

images.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

images.title: Manage site reliability
Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

value.title: AZ-400: Develop an instrumentation strategy
value.excerpt:
Learn how logging, telemetry, and monitoring give you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

images.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager

topItems.title: Introduction to App Center
topItems.excerpt: Characterize the types of services offered by App Center. Describe the use of App Center to build, distribute, test, and analyze usage of apps.

images.title: Introduction to App Center

topItems.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

images.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning service
value.excerpt: Azure includes a variety of services for designing and deploying machine learning models. Learn how to leverage these services in your data analysis.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Working with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Data is the foundation of machine learning. In this module, you will learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning, enabling you to build scalable, cloud-based model training solutions.

topItems.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is a cloud platform for training, deploying, managing, and monitoring machine learning models. Learn how to use the Azure Machine Learning Python SDK to create enterprise-ready machine learning solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

topItems.title: Working with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Data is the foundation of machine learning. In this module, you will learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning, enabling you to build scalable, cloud-based model training solutions.

topItems.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the basics of Docker containers, container orchestration with Kubernetes, and managed clusters on Azure Kubernetes Service.

topItems.title: Introduction to Docker containers
topItems.excerpt: Describes the benefits of using Docker containers as a containerization platform. Discuss the infrastructure provided by the Docker platform.

images.title: Introduction to Docker containers

topItems.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
topItems.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Kubernetes. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Kubernetes

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Azure Kubernetes Service. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service

topItems.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application using Azure Kubernetes Service using declarative manifest files.

images.title: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Work with relational data in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path introduces you to Azure-supported SQL-based enterprise data solutions enabling you to store and retrieve your app's data in the cloud.

topItems.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure Portal and Cloud Shell to provision, connect, and manage Azure SQL databases.

images.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data

topItems.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
topItems.excerpt: Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. Learn how to create and deploy this service and connect it to your applications.

images.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server

topItems.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
topItems.excerpt: SQL elastic pools allow you to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

images.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools

topItems.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Secure your Azure SQL Database to keep your data secure and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

images.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: When you have an application that consists of components running on different computers, servers, and mobile devices, reliable communications between those components can be difficult and unreliable. Azure provides several technologies that you can use to communicate more reliably, including Storage queues, Event Hubs, Event Grid, and Service Bus. This module shows you how to choose the best technology for your communication task.

images.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Storage account with the correct options for your business needs.

images.title: Create an Azure Storage account

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing to your application, so you improve your ability to distribute your application around the world. Use Traffic Manager to improve the performance and availability of your application.

images.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft commercial marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of the Microsoft commercial marketplace, including Microsoft AppSource, Azure Marketplace, offer types, and Marketplace Rewards

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account

value.title: Architect secure infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

topItems.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

topItems.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Your application requires service passwords, connection strings, and other secret configuration values to do its job. Storing and handling secret values is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of leakage. Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

images.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

images.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor resources by using Azure Monitor and implement backup and recover in Azure. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate monitoring options for an Azure virtual machine (VM). Enable diagnostics to get data about your VM. View VM metrics and create an alert to monitor performance.

images.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

value.title: Explore computer vision in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Computer vision is an area of artificial intelligence (AI) in which software systems are designed to perceive the world visually, though cameras, images, and video. There are multiple specific types of computer vision problem that AI engineers and data scientists can solve using a mix of custom machine learning models and platform-as-a-service (PaaS) solutions - including many cognitive services in Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

images.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

images.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service

topItems.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Object detection is a form of computer vision in which artificial intelligence (AI) agents can identify and locate specific types of object in an image or camera feed.

images.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service

topItems.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
topItems.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

images.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

value.title: Work with relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure supports several popular SQL-based database solutions including SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Learn how to use these enterprise data solutions in Azure to store and retrieve your app's data in the cloud.

topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure Portal and Cloud Shell to provision, connect, and manage Azure SQL databases.

images.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

topItems.excerpt: Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. Learn how to create and deploy this service and connect it to your applications.

topItems.excerpt: SQL elastic pools allow you to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.excerpt: Digital transformation is a business innovation fueled by the explosion of the cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT).  and allows organizations with new ways to understand and transform their business.

value.excerpt: Discuss the different load balancers in Azure and how to choose the right Azure load balancer solution to meet your requirements.

value.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.
